duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide amazing customer service across all customer service channels.
Exceed customer expectations by developing creative solutions to problems and working across teams to solve them.
Coordinate and follow up with other departments to ensure problem resolution and work together with other customer service team members to promote an environment of customer satisfaction.
Own, update and improve the SOPs and processes for the customer service as circumstances adjust and trends are noticed.
Collect, collate, and assess data around the history and trend of customer service escalations.
Relentlessly seek how to enhance the customer experience, be innovative and a critical thinker.
